name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D新衣装お披露目】AZKi 5th Anniversary Live ＂with U -みんなと一緒にこれからも-＂【#AZKi5周年ライブ】 [7TtlKURvLDI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs the song 'ω猫' (Omega Neko) in her default 3D outfit with cat ears.
Transition period with a fade to black and costume change.
AZKi performs the song 'FreeGeo' in her new 5th-anniversary 3D outfit including a hat.

subtitles.original: 君の愛のぜんぶをください
subtitles.english: Give me all of your love

subtitles.original: そしたら絶対絶対にゃんにゃん！にゃんだふぉー！
subtitles.english: Then I'll definitely, definitely be meow-meow! Meow-nderful!

subtitles.original: にゃんってかまって！にゃんにゃん！
subtitles.english: Give me attention with a meow! Meow-meow!

subtitles.original: アルファ・ベータ・ガンマ　変遷たどれば
subtitles.english: Alpha, Beta, Gamma, if we follow the changes

subtitles.original: とーぜん到達だ！目指すはオメガ
subtitles.english: Of course we'll reach it! Our goal is Omega

subtitles.original: 君ときたいから　果てまでラブ
subtitles.english: Because I want to go with you, love to the end

subtitles.original: だって、ωは猫マーク！！！！
subtitles.english: Because, ω is a cat mark!!!!

subtitles.original: 臆病で迷いがちな　ちいさなハートを
subtitles.english: A small heart that's cowardly and prone to getting lost

subtitles.original: 受けとめて　両腕で包んでほしい
subtitles.english: Accept it, I want you to wrap your arms around it

subtitles.original: これでも愛情表現にゃん！（にゃん！）
subtitles.english: This is my way of showing love, meow! (Meow!)

subtitles.original: てかそれそろそろ気づいてにゃん！（にゃん！）
subtitles.english: By the way, notice it already, meow! (Meow!)

subtitles.original: 他人の言葉とか知らないにゃん！
subtitles.english: I don't care about others' words, meow!

subtitles.original: ぼくが一番だいすきにゃん！（にゃん！）
subtitles.english: I love you the most, meow! (Meow!)

subtitles.original: にゃんにゃん！君とずっとずっといたいので
subtitles.english: Meow-meow! Because I want to be with you forever and ever

subtitles.original: ボクに首輪をしといてね？（にゃんにゃんにゃん！）
subtitles.english: So put a collar on me, okay? (Meow-meow-meow!)

subtitles.original: 理解ってないね？そんなのなくたって
subtitles.english: You don't understand, do you? Even without that

subtitles.original: ボクは君の運命のにゃんにゃん！
subtitles.english: I'm your destiny, meow-meow!

subtitles.original: にゃん！君に愛を尽くすから
subtitles.english: Meow! Because I'll give you all my love

subtitles.original: ほかに浮気はしないでね？（にゃんにゃん！）
subtitles.english: Don't cheat on me, okay? (Meow-meow!)

subtitles.original: 理解ってしまった！触れた瞬間に
subtitles.english: I've realized! The moment we touched

subtitles.original: 君はボクの運命のにゃんにゃん！
subtitles.english: You're my destiny, meow-meow!

subtitles.original: にゃん！にゃん！夢がいつか叶うまで
subtitles.english: Meow! Meow! Until the dream comes true one day

subtitles.original: 猫の手を借りまくってね？（にゃんにゃんにゃん！）
subtitles.english: Borrow all the cat help you need, okay? (Meow-meow-meow!)

subtitles.original: 君の愛のぜんぶをください
subtitles.english: Give me all of your love

subtitles.original: そしたらずっとずっとにゃんにゃん！にゃんだふぉー！
subtitles.english: Then forever and ever, meow-meow! Meow-nderful!

subtitles.original: にゃんってかまって！にゃんにゃん！
subtitles.english: Give me attention with a meow! Meow-meow!

subtitles.original: もっとかまって！にゃんにゃん！
subtitles.english: Give me more attention! Meow-meow!

subtitles.original:
FreeGeo
作詞・作曲・編曲：Twinfield
subtitles.english:
FreeGeo
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Twinfield

subtitles.original: もっと世界中で　ただ優しい　笑顔を見たいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to see more of those simple, kind smiles all over the world

subtitles.original: 心まで響かせて
subtitles.english: Let it resonate to your heart

subtitles.original: 物語は何度だって続くよ
subtitles.english: The story will continue again and again

subtitles.original: ずっともっと　歌っていたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to keep singing forever and ever

subtitles.original: 重なっていくほどに強くなるの
subtitles.english: It gets stronger the more it overlaps

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつ進んでく
subtitles.english: Stepping forward one by one

subtitles.original: 旅路はまだ途中だよ
subtitles.english: The journey is still in progress

subtitles.original: 遠く離れていても　消えない未来があるんだ
subtitles.english: Even if we're far apart, there's a future that won't fade away

subtitles.original: 少しずつ変わっても　繋がって奏でてくんだ
subtitles.english: Even if it changes little by little, we'll stay connected and keep playing

subtitles.original: 雨の日も晴れの日も　この想いが届くように
subtitles.english: In rain or shine, so that these feelings reach you

subtitles.original: 見つけてあげるよ
subtitles.english: I'll find you

subtitles.original: 想い出の数だけ描く
subtitles.english: As many as there are memories

subtitles.original: フレーズは軌跡
subtitles.english: The phrases are a trajectory

subtitles.original: メロディは止まらないよ
subtitles.english: The melody won't stop

subtitles.original: 好きなんだこの場所でまた
subtitles.english: I love being in this place again

subtitles.original: Ah Ah 笑顔のままで会いましょう
subtitles.english: Ah Ah, let's meet again with smiles on our faces

subtitles.original: 想像した以上に
subtitles.english: More than I imagined

subtitles.original: まだ伝えたいことがあるんだ
subtitles.english: There's still more I want to tell you

subtitles.original: 「ありがとう」じゃ足りない
subtitles.english: Saying 'thank you' is not enough

subtitles.original: ありふれた言葉だけど聴いてて
subtitles.english: It's an ordinary word, but please listen

subtitles.original: 探し続けていたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been searching for it

subtitles.original: 心の奥を示すランドマーク
subtitles.english: The landmark that points to the depths of my heart

subtitles.original: きっとずっと進んでく
subtitles.english: I'll definitely keep going forever

subtitles.original: 旅路は夢じゃないんだ
subtitles.english: The journey is not a dream

subtitles.original: 鼓動速く鳴るような　愛してる景色があるんだ
subtitles.english: There's a scenery I love that makes my heart beat faster

subtitles.original: 少しずつ変わっても　繋がってる奏でてるんだ
subtitles.english: Even if it changes little by little, we're connected and playing together

subtitles.original: 示した先にあるでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's at the end of what I pointed to, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 私の想い届けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to deliver my feelings

subtitles.original: ここで会いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's meet here

subtitles.original: 想い出の数だけ描く
subtitles.english: As many as there are memories

subtitles.original: フレーズは軌跡
subtitles.english: The phrases are a trajectory

subtitles.original: メロディは止まらないよ
subtitles.english: The melody won't stop

subtitles.original: 好きなんだこの場所でまた
subtitles.english: I love being in this place again

subtitles.original: Ah Ah 笑顔のままで会いましょう
subtitles.english: Ah Ah, let's meet again with smiles on our faces

subtitles.original: 止め処なく溢れていく
subtitles.english: Overflowing endlessly

subtitles.original: 真っ白な地図を見て
subtitles.english: Looking at the pure white map

subtitles.original: 少しずつ埋まってく
subtitles.english: It's filling up little by little

subtitles.original: 色とりどりの音楽
subtitles.english: With colorful music

subtitles.original: 雨の日も晴れの日も　この想いが届くように
subtitles.english: In rain or shine, so that these feelings reach you
